name: Fly Simulator (itch) (HFM Games)
description:
Confrontation Of Flies and Humans

You work as a waiter and lead an uphill battle for your clients. You pushing back the flies from the food, otherwise you'll never get anything. Maybe are you a hungry insect trying to increase your population? Choose the opposing side. The war is already underway.

Features
  • Up to 10 flies vs. 1 person
  • Various weapons to fight the flies
  • The growth of flies to a giant size
  • Try yourself in the role of waiter
SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
    MINIMUM:
    • OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7
    • Processor: Dual core CPU @2GHz (Pentium D or better)
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Intel HD 4000, GeForce 8800, ATI 1950 or better
    • DirectX: Version 9.0
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible audio device
